Interface com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.IPushRegistrationObserver
Inherited members: ShowHide
Deprecated: ShowHide
com.penthera.virtuososdk.client

Interface IPushRegistrationObserver

  • public interface IPushRegistrationObserver
    Enables clients to determine whether Google Cloud Messaging registration is complete. The client will not be able to receive subscription updates from push notifications until registration successfully finishes. If a recoverable error occurs, the client must handle it by prompting the user to take corrective action. The actions may involve setting up a Google account or installing Google Play Services. If a transient error occurs, such as a networking problem, the SDK will try to recover the registration ID during its next sync.
    • Fields

      static int EXCEPTION_OCCURRED
      Error code indicating an exception occurred when attempting to obtain and register registration Id.

      Error code indicating an exception occurred when attempting to obtain and register registration Id.

    • Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      onRegisterFailed 
      abstract void onRegisterFailed(int errorCode, java.lang.String reason)
      Called when Virtuoso fails to retrieve the registration ID from Google Cloud Messaging.
      void onRegisterFailed(int errorCode, java.lang.String reason)
      Called when Virtuoso fails to retrieve the registration ID from Google Cloud Messaging. We recommend that you call GooglePlayServicesUtil.isUserRecoverableError on the reason. If the error is recoverable, you can show a corrective dialog by calling GooglePlayServicesUtil.getErrorDialog. The errorCode can be one of the following ConnectionResult constants defined for GooglePlayServices:
      • SUCCESS
      • SERVICE_MISSING
      • SERVICE_VERSION_UPDATE_REQUIRED
      • SERVICE_DISABLED
      • SERVICE_INVALID
      • DATE_INVALID
      or EXCEPTION_OCCURRED
      Parameters:
      errorCode - The GooglePlayServices ConnectionResult errorCode that uniquely identifies the problem that occurred, or -1 in the case of an Exception.
      reason - Human-readable explanation of the errorCode
      onRegisterSuccess 
      abstract void onRegisterSuccess(java.lang.String registrationId)
      Called when Virtuoso has successfully obtained a registration ID from Google Cloud Messaging (GCM).
      void onRegisterSuccess(java.lang.String registrationId)
      Called when Virtuoso has successfully obtained a registration ID from Google Cloud Messaging (GCM). Note: This method is also guaranteed to be called in the event that the GCM is already registered.
      Parameters:
      registrationId - The Google Cloud Messaging registration ID.
      onServiceAvailabilityResponse 
      abstract void onServiceAvailabilityResponse(int errorCode)
      Called to indicate whether the Google Cloud Messaging service is available.
      void onServiceAvailabilityResponse(int errorCode)
      Called to indicate whether the Google Cloud Messaging service is available. You must not assume that GCM is available on all devices. We recommend that you call GooglePlayServicesUtil.isUserRecoverableError on the reason. If the error is recoverable, you can show a corrective dialog by calling GooglePlayServicesUtil.getErrorDialog. The errorCode can be one of the following ConnectionResult constants defined for GooglePlayServices:
      • SUCCESS
      • SERVICE_MISSING
      • SERVICE_VERSION_UPDATE_REQUIRED
      • SERVICE_DISABLED
      • SERVICE_INVALID
      • DATE_INVALID
      Parameters:
      errorCode - The GooglePlayServices ConnectionResult errorCode that uniquely identifies the problem that occurred
